title: Deja Vu
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Take-out, Creole, Soul Food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu includes a section vegan and vegetarian section with around 8 main items. Mock chicken salad and sandwich, veggie rolls, barbecue tofu, and pasta. Each main entree is served with choice of two sides which include collard greens, candied yams, and other vegan sides. Has vegan desserts. Previously named Java, Juice and Jazz Creole at different location prior to Feb 2010. Previously located on Florida St.
